query:
WITH updated AS (
            UPDATE event_game_schedule
            SET
                start_time = $2,
                duration_minutes = $3,
                last_modified = NOW()
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING
                id,
                event_id,
                game_id,
                start_time,
                duration_minutes,
                is_pinned,
                created_at,
                last_modified
        )
        SELECT
            updated.id,
            updated.event_id,
            updated.game_id,
            sg.name AS game_name,
            updated.start_time,
            updated.duration_minutes,
            updated.is_pinned,
            updated.created_at,
            updated.last_modified
        FROM updated
        INNER JOIN steam_game sg ON updated.game_id = sg.appid
